channel.title: Char Interface Bug
channel.description:
Hello :D
Im Making new Server TestScape Based. But i forgot how to fix the Char interface bug.
Can Anyone tell me How? :|
I Already fixed the Accept thing but i dunno how to make it gives ya Other look. :confused:
Thanks if ya Help.
~Waste[br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2007, 12:56:51 PM[/size][hr]Please Anyone Help me?

item.title: Char Interface Bug
item.dc:creator: @Kayla_not_good_enoug Kayla (not good enough)
item.description:
@Kayla_not_good_enoug wrote:

most likely, u are thinking sumthing is a bug that isnt, if you accept the character look it will take affect when u move next. if this is not the case, best way is to make an else if statement that will do it for you with a command such as “girl one” This code i dont remember how i got it, maybe i made it, maybe not but here it should explain it. else if (command.startsWith("runway")) { sendMessage("You now have a fabulous new look..."); playerLook[0]=1; // gender... 0 for male, 1 for female pHead=48; // hair style pTorso=60; // body style pArms=61; // arm style pHands=68; // hand style pLegs=72; // leg style pFeet=80; // feet style playerLook[1]=1; // color change playerLook[2]=1; // color change playerLook[3]=2; // color change playerLook[4]=3; // color change playerLook[5]=1; // color change updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
